description: This package contains the core assembly which is shared by various GleamTech products. Product packages such as FileUltimate, ImageUltimate, VideoUltimate and DocumentUltimate depend on this package.
releaseNotes:
Version 1.0.8 - February 7, 2016
- Improved: Updated Amazon S3 sdk.
- Fixed: PhysicalLocation.ImpersonationInfo property was serialized to string where it should not.

Version 1.0.6 - January 25, 2016
- Fixed: A security vulnerability with resource.ashx when application pool account was misconfigured.

Version 1.0.5 - January 17, 2016
- Fixed: Routes were not registered/restored correctly if RouteTables contained instances of custom types derived from 
  the default Route class.

Version 1.0.4 - January 11, 2016
- Fixed: FileResponse was sending more bytes than requested in some cases which broke HTTP protocols.
- Fixed: FileResponse was sending "accept-ranges: bytes" header when the stream was not seekable.

Version 1.0.2 - January 10, 2016
- Fixed: Updated Newtonsoft.Json to 8.0.2 for fixing some serialization bugs.

Version 1.0.1 - January 6, 2016
- Fixed: "Could not load file or assembly Microsoft.Web.Infrastructure" error on some machines.
title: GleamTech Core Library
